title: Χρόνο Sahara, Smart Watch Face
summary: Sahara, inspired by simplicity and beauty of Sahara.
description: Sahara, inspired by simplicity and beauty of Sahara, the biggest wonder of the earth.Elegant, easy to read and eye catching design.Supports both round & square watches and has big date display.Χρόνο (Chrono) in greek means Time.http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%CF%87%CF%81%CF%8C%CE%BD%CE%BF%CF%82
descriptionHTML:
Sahara, inspired by simplicity and beauty of Sahara, the biggest wonder of the earth.
Elegant, easy to read and eye catching design.
Supports both round & square watches and has big date display.

Χρόνο (Chrono) in greek means Time.
http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/%CF%87%CF%81%CF%8C%CE%BD%CE%BF%CF%82
comments: Looks great kinda buggy Love the look of this but has an issue with the date for the fossil q founder if that could get fixed totally 5 star
